description: File format that enables JPEG and other bitstreams to be exchanged between a wide variety of platforms and applications.  For JPEG encodings, JFIF_1_02 is more widely adopted.
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">www.digitalpreservation.gov/formats/fdd/</field><field name="documentation">http://www.itu.int/rec/T-REC-T.84/en, http://www.jpeg.org/public/spiff.pdf</field><field name="filenameExtension">jpg, jpeg, spf, spiff, jls</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
name: ISO/IEC 10918-3:1994, Annex F. Still Picture Interchange File Format (SPIFF).
